lepton.optim.objpoollib

Class AbstractObjectPool<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • lepton.optim.objpoollib.AbstractObjectPool<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObjectPool, SourcePool

    public abstract class AbstractObjectPool<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Object pool with custom behavior.
